title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Constructivist-Based Project Learning for Future Technology Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete projects analyzing the societal impact of digital and automated technologies

Learners can effectively perform roles in large-scale team projects using collaborative tools

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
